title: Will using a contact tracing app be mandatory? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi! It’s unlikely, but never certain, that we will be forced to use contact tracing apps. One of the best things about living in a democratic nation is that governments lack strict controls over aspects of our lives such as this. That said, it will be in our collective interests as a society to get as many people to sign up as possible, as this is the only way to make it an effective solution! Our ability to leverage modern technology is the perfect balancing force for a global pandemic that has been worsened by modern lifestyles (e.g. dense populations and cheap air travel) All the best!
